name: rosemary
title: p[RO]duction of [S]parql qu[E]ries with [M]inim[A]l expe[R]ience using [Y]asgui
description: rosemary is a plugin for YASGUI (Yet Another SPARQL GUI) which facilitates the creation of SPARQL queries without requiring knowledge of the language
keywords: tools, SPARQL, query, Linked Data, LOD
author: Kody Moodley
